name: Modelling And Animation Showcase
description:
Project for 'New Technologies' Module at University. Showcases 3D model created and animated in Blender interacting with a 3D environment.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Left Click: Fire gun (Destroys red barrels)
  • Q: Fire laser (Destroys brick walls)
  • E: Punch (physically push away obstacles)
  • Alt+F4: Quit game
